name: The Sepia French 75
description: The classic French 75, with a rosy twist.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounces freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, simple syrup, lemon, and orange bitters to a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Top with rosé and garnish with orange twist.
